snippet: Playmaker Riyad Mahrez and his Leicester City team mates are taking nothing for granted, despite the club being just one win away from winning a maiden Premier League title....

headline.main: Mahrez Says Leicester Still Have to Work for League Title
headline.print_headline: Mahrez Says Leicester Still Have to Work for League Title

lead_paragraph: Playmaker Riyad Mahrez and his Leicester City team mates are taking nothing for granted, despite the club being just one win away from winning a maiden Premier League title.

snippet: Manchester United striker Wayne Rooney has been rested for Thursday's Europa League clash with Feyenoord, manager Jose Mourinho said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Man United's Rooney Rested for Feyenoord Clash in Europa League
headline.print_headline: Man United's Rooney Rested for Feyenoord Clash in Europa League

lead_paragraph: Manchester United striker Wayne Rooney has been rested for Thursday's Europa League clash with Feyenoord, manager Jose Mourinho said on Wednesday.

snippet: Premier League West Bromwich Albion and Watford were knocked out in the League Cup second round by lower-league opponents on Tuesday as a strong Liverpool side crushed championship Burton Albion 5-0....

headline.main: West Brom, Watford Out of League Cup, Liverpool Rout Burton
headline.print_headline: West Brom, Watford Out of League Cup, Liverpool Rout Burton

lead_paragraph: Premier League West Bromwich Albion and Watford were knocked out in the League Cup second round by lower-league opponents on Tuesday as a strong Liverpool side crushed championship Burton Albion 5-0.

snippet: Manchester United will come up against their former striker Robin van Persie after being drawn in a tough Europa League group on Friday alongside Fenerbahce, Feyenoord and Zorya Luhansk....

headline.main: Man United Meet Fenerbahce, Feyenoord in Tough Europa League Group
headline.print_headline: Man United Meet Fenerbahce, Feyenoord in Tough Europa League Group

lead_paragraph: Manchester United will come up against their former striker Robin van Persie after being drawn in a tough Europa League group on Friday alongside Fenerbahce, Feyenoord and Zorya Luhansk.

snippet: Chelsea captain John Terry has been ruled out of Tuesday's Champions League clash at Paris St Germain after failing to recover from injury, the Premier League club said....

headline.main: Chelsea Captain Terry Out of PSG Champions League Clash
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Captain Terry Out of PSG Champions League Clash

lead_paragraph: Chelsea captain John Terry has been ruled out of Tuesday's Champions League clash at Paris St Germain after failing to recover from injury, the Premier League club said.

snippet: Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp is unlikely to rest first-team players for the League Cup clash against second tier Derby County, he said on Monday....

headline.main: Klopp Vows to Field Strong Liverpool Side in League Cup
headline.print_headline: Klopp Vows to Field Strong Liverpool Side in League Cup

lead_paragraph: Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp is unlikely to rest first-team players for the League Cup clash against second tier Derby County, he said on Monday.

snippet: Manchester City striker Kelechi Iheanacho is poised to become the benefactor of a mini-injury crisis at the club after manager Manuel Pellegrini confirmed that the Nigerian teenager has been included in his Champions League squad....

headline.main: Man City's Iheanacho to Be Given Champions League Chance
headline.print_headline: Man City's Iheanacho to Be Given Champions League Chance

lead_paragraph: Manchester City striker Kelechi Iheanacho is poised to become the benefactor of a mini-injury crisis at the club after manager Manuel Pellegrini confirmed that the Nigerian teenager has been included in his Champions League squad.

snippet: Two professional women’s teams faced off for the first time at the N.H.L.’s marquee regular-season event....

headline.main: Ice Problems and Injury Plague Women’s Debut at the Winter Classic
headline.print_headline: Ice Problems and Injury Plague Women’s Debut at the Winter Classic

abstract: Boston Pride of National Women's Hockey League ties Les Canadiennes of Canadian Women's Hockey League, 1-1, in inaugural Outdoor Women’s Classic at Gillette Stadium; Pride player Denna Laing is injured after losing her footing, raising concerns about ice conditions that were questioned earlier in day.
lead_paragraph: Two professional women’s teams faced off for the first time at the N.H.L.’s marquee regular-season event.

snippet: Liverpool's reward for their stirring Europa League fightback against Borussia Dortmund was a semi-final against Spanish side Villarreal in Friday's draw that also pitched holders Sevilla against Shakhtar Donetsk....

headline.main: Comeback Kings Liverpool Face Villarreal in Europa League
headline.print_headline: Comeback Kings Liverpool Face Villarreal in Europa League

lead_paragraph: Liverpool's reward for their stirring Europa League fightback against Borussia Dortmund was a semi-final against Spanish side Villarreal in Friday's draw that also pitched holders Sevilla against Shakhtar Donetsk.

snippet: Premier League champions Leicester City and Arsenal are among the five clubs charging most for Champions League tickets this season, according to spread-betting firm Spreadex....

headline.main: Arsenal, Leicester Tickets Among Most Expensive in Champions League
headline.print_headline: Arsenal, Leicester Tickets Among Most Expensive in Champions League

lead_paragraph: Premier League champions Leicester City and Arsenal are among the five clubs charging most for Champions League tickets this season, according to spread-betting firm Spreadex.
